articles.author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/adam-harvey/7308412
articles.title: Australian mother escapes death penalty for drug trafficking
articles.description: Maria Exposto was caught with 1.1kg of crystal meth when she was arrested at Kuala Lumpur international airport in 2014.

articles.title: Home and Away actress fighting for life after triple-fatal Boxing Day crash
articles.description: One of the two sisters in a critical condition after yesterday's triple-fatal collision on the NSW south coast is actress Jessica Falkholt.

articles.title: Sydney to Hobart leaders ahead of race record
articles.description: Supermaxis in this year's Sydney to Hobart Yacht Race are ahead of record time as they cross into the Bass Strait.

articles.title: Cook's long-awaited century puts England in charge at the MCG
articles.description: English opening batsman Alistair Cook breaks his shackles in vintage fashion, bringing up a century in the final over of the day to steer the tourists into a strong position after day two at the MCG.

articles.author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/david-chau/8543210
articles.title: Why is petrol so expensive? Global oil deals and the Reserve Bank's dilemma
articles.description: On average, Australian petrol prices have risen to their most expensive levels this year â€” which puts more pressure on household spending and makes it harder for the Reserve Bank to lift interest rates.

articles.title: Fire near Melbourne golf course brought under control
articles.description: A fast-moving fire that began in a nature reserve in Melbourne's south-east is now under control.

articles.title: Hero sheriff breaks through frozen pond to rescue boy
articles.description: A sheriff's deputy was desperate and numb from the cold as he punched and stomped his way into a frozen pond on Christmas Day to pull out an eight-year-old boy.

articles.title: Apple sued after admitting it slows down aging iPhones
articles.description: Eight lawsuits filed in various US federal courts are claiming that Apple Inc defrauded iPhone users by slowing devices without warning to compensate for poor battery performance.

articles.title: Kim Jong-un's rocket men singled out for US sanctions
articles.description: Kim Jong-un's right hand men are being targeted by US sanctions for their roles in developing ballistic missiles.

articles.author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/michael-janda/166854
articles.title: Do full recourse home loans make Australia immune from a housing crash?
articles.description: American households handing back the keys to their house if they can't afford their mortgage has been cited as a key reason why the US property market crashed and Australia's won't. But the true picture is more complex.
